name: Escape From Castle Doom
description:
This is my submission for Miz Jam 1, it is a platforming action adventure, completed in 30ish hours.

The hero is a wizard who is imprisoned and must escape by transforming goblins in to ducks, avoiding evil traps and trying to save as many ducks as possible by shrinking them in to his pouch and carrying them to the exit.

See how quickly you can complete it, and can you save all 40 ducks?

Music was by https://sonatina.itch.io , everything else by me. Massive thanks for her agreeing to help with short notice.

In game controls are listed as mouse and keyboard in the tutorial, but it is possible to play with a gamepad too if anyone is interested, although it is not massively tested with that.

Thanks for checking out my game.
